agent.name: Jadex-MarsWorld-Manager
agent.description: The manager agent can be used to launch the mars world example. It consists of three different kinds of agents: 1. Sentry agents are reponsible for examining orebodies. An ore capacity is shown on the map when an orebody was examined. 2.Production agents produce ore at available orebodies. 3.Carry agents are able to carry ore to the base. Objective is to carry as much ore as possible to the homebase in a predefined misssion time.
